item.title: Cars Analysis
item.description: All data is taken from the mtCars dataset and plotted using ggplot2 Miles Per Gallon vs.Â Horsepower This plot shows the relation between Horsepower and Miles per Gallon. The number of cylinders in the car is denoted by color. As you can see, there is a significant downward trend. As the amount of horsepower and the number of cylinders go down, the number of miles to the gallon goes up.
